learn.title: What do you want to learn?
learn.subtitle: Choose a level to start
learn.footer: Developers by Ewersson and Maria de FÃ¡tima

beginner.title: Beginner
beginner.description: In this introductory JavaScript module, you will learn the fundamental concepts of the language and how it works in practice. We will learn to store and manipulate data, understand programming logic and comprehend how JavaScript interprets and displays information.

intermediate.title: Intermediate
intermediate.description: In the intermediate JavaScript module, you have already improved your knowledge and developed logic! So it's time to explore more complex data structures and template string concatenation, allowing you to create integrations and iterations.

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.description: In the advanced JavaScript module, you will explore more sophisticated concepts such as object-oriented programming, creating highly dynamic solutions. Structuring objects, arrays, methods, higher-order functions, and diving into data concepts, allowing you to structure and process information in a scalable way.

congratulations.title: Congratulations! You got {{correct}} out of {{total}} questions right!
congratulations.subtitle: You completed the {{level}} level!
